summary: This is a docket notification from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals indicating that attorney Christian R. Everdell has been terminated as counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell in the case United States v. Maxwell. The document serves as an official record of the change in legal representation.

persons.name: Christian R. Everdell
persons.context: Attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell whose representation was terminated as recorded in this docket entry.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the case United States v. Maxwell, for whom Christian R. Everdell was previously an attorney.

connections.description: Everdell was serving as defense attorney for Maxwell, but this relationship was terminated as indicated in the docket.

events.title: Termination of Attorney Christian R. Everdell
events.description: Attorney Christian R. Everdell was terminated as counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell in the appellate case United States v. Maxwell.

keyFacts: Attorney Christian R. Everdell was terminated as counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell on April 27, 2021.
The termination was recorded in the docket for the appellate case United States v. Maxwell (Case Numbers 21-58, 21-770).
The document is a formal notification from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals regarding a change in legal representation.
The case involves Ghislaine Maxwell as the defendant in proceedings brought by the United States government.
